typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		type as string,
		name as string,
		ppu as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine') ~> source1
source(output(
		id as string,
		type as string,
		name as string,
		ppu as double,
		batters as (batter as (id as string, type as string)[]),
		topping as (id as string, type as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	backslashEscape: true) ~> source2
source2 foldDown(unroll(batters.batter, batters.batter),
	mapColumn(
		id,
		type,
		name,
		ppu,
		batterid = batters.batter.id,
		topping,
		battertype = batters.batter.type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 foldDown(unroll(topping),
	mapColumn(
		id,
		type,
		name,
		ppu,
		batterid,
		toppingid = topping.id,
		battertype,
		toppingtype = topping.type
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	store: 'cache',
	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
Flatten2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink2

source(output(
		col0 as string,
		col1 as string,
		col2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 parse(col22 = col2 ? (val1 as integer,
		val2 as integer,
		val3 as integer),
	format: 'delimited',
	columnNamesAsHeader: false,
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	nullValue: '') ~> Parse1
Parse1 select(mapColumn(
		col0,
		col1,
		val1 = col22.val1,
		val2 = col22.val2,
		val3 = col22.val3
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from aztestloader where modifieddate >'@{activity('Lookupv').output.firstrow.fromdate}'
and modifieddate<'@{pipeline().parameters.ToDate}'

select * from aztestloader where modifieddate >'@{activity('Lookupv').output.firstrow.fromdate}'
and modifieddate<'@{pipeline().parameters.ToDate}'

select * from aztestloader where modifieddate >'@{activity('Lookupv').output.firstrow.fromdate}'
and modifieddate<'@{pipeline().parameters.ToDate}'

properties.description: This pipeline will copy one batch of objects. The objects belonging to this batch will be copied parallelly.

activities.name: DivideOneBatchIntoMultipleGroups
activities.description: Divide objects from single batch into multiple sub parallel groups to avoid reaching the output limit of lookup activity.

activities.name: GetObjectsPerGroupToCopy
activities.description: Get objects (tables etc.) from control table required to be copied in this group. The order of objects to be copied following the TaskId in control table (ORDER BY [TaskId] DESC).

activities.name: CopyObjectsInOneGroup
activities.description: Execute another pipeline to copy objects from one group. The objects belonging to this group will be copied parallelly.

properties.description: This pipeline will copy objects from one group. The objects belonging to this group will be copied parallelly.

activities.name: ListObjectsFromOneGroup
activities.description: List objects from one group and iterate each of them to downstream activities

activities.name: RouteJobsBasedOnLoadingBehavior
activities.description: Check the loading behavior for each object if it requires full load or incremental load. If it is Default or FullLoad case, do full load. If it is DeltaLoad case, do incremental load via watermark column to identify changes.

activities.name: FullLoadOneObject
activities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

defaultActivities.name: DefaultFullLoadOneObject
defaultActivities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

properties.description: This pipeline will copy objects from one group. The objects belonging to this group will be copied parallelly.

activities.name: ListObjectsFromOneGroup
activities.description: List objects from one group and iterate each of them to downstream activities

activities.name: RouteJobsBasedOnLoadingBehavior
activities.description: Check the loading behavior for each object if it requires full load or incremental load. If it is Default or FullLoad case, do full load. If it is DeltaLoad case, do incremental load via watermark column to identify changes.

activities.name: FullLoadOneObject
activities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination

defaultActivities.name: DefaultFullLoadOneObject
defaultActivities.description: Take a full snapshot on this object and copy it to the destination
